page_6.text: As the rock rolled away, everyone cheered! “You taught us about sharing and working together,” the aliens said. Zoe beamed with pride.
page_6.scene: The aliens and Zoe celebrate by jumping for joy under a sparkling rainbow, with the rock safely out of their way behind them.

character.name: Zoe
character.description: Zoe is a lively 6-year-old girl with big, bright eyes and curly hair. She wears a sparkly space helmet and a rainbow tutu, reflecting her imaginative spirit.
